title: E-Commerce Video Editor
job_overview:
We are seeking a talented and dedicated full-time Video Editor to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for video editing and a strong understanding of various AI platforms to create engaging UGC and both short and long-form VSL ad videos.

Key Responsibilities:

- Edit and produce high-quality video content tailored for various platforms.
- Utilize AI tools to enhance video production, including but not limited to effects, transitions, and sound design.
- Collaborate with the content team to develop creative concepts and storyboards.
- Ensure all videos meet branding guidelines and project deadlines.
- Maintain organized files and workflows for efficient production.

Requirements:

- Proven experience as a video editor, with a portfolio showcasing your work.
- Fluent in English, both written and spoken, with excellent communication skills. Add 34you in your response.
- Experience with AI video editing platforms and tools.
- Ability to work independently and manage time effectively in a fast-paced environment.
- Strong attention to detail and a creative mindset.
- Experience with ClickUp is a bonus
